What are the treatments for Chronic lymphocytic inflammation with pontine perivascular enhancement responsive to steroids ?,"How might CLIPPERS be treated? The signs and symptoms of CLIPPERS typically improve after treatment with steroids. Initial treatment may involve a short course of high dose steroids given intravenously, and then oral steroids.
